widgets_values:
I am giving you two images:

IMAGE 1 (reference garment): A photograph of the exact dress to use as reference. It has THIN VERTICAL PINSTRIPES on the skirt (narrow evenly-spaced vertical lines that follow the drape of the A-line skirt). The bodice has delicate sketchy black ink botanical illustrations featuring chrysanthemums, bird silhouettes, and flowing stems. The straps are thin chain links. The fabric is natural warm cream/beige.

IMAGE 2 (campaign scene): A fashion campaign photo showing a chrome mannequin in an editorial setting.

YOUR TASK: Generate a SINGLE fashion campaign photograph. Take the mannequin and scene from IMAGE 2 and dress it in the EXACT garment from IMAGE 1.

CRITICAL REQUIREMENTS:
1. THIN VERTICAL PINSTRIPES on the skirt - the most important detail
2. Delicate sketchy ink botanical illustrations on the bodice
3. Thin chain link straps
4. Natural warm cream fabric tone
5. Flowing A-line maxi silhouette

Output ONE image only (not a grid or collage). Maintain the exact scene, lighting, mannequin, and environment from IMAGE 2. Only replace the garment.
nodes.title: Nano Banana Garment Reskin

groups.title: Topshop SS26 - Nano Banana Garment Reskin Workflow

manual_config.description: Garment reskinning workflow for Topshop SS26 campaign. Uses Nano Banana (Gemini 2.5 Flash Image) to replace AI-generated garments with the exact reference dress.
usage: 1. Set 'Garment Reference' to the cropped front panel of the garment (look6_front.jpg)
2. Set 'Campaign Scene Image' to any campaign shot to reskin
3. For back views, swap the reference to look6_back.jpg
4. Adjust the prompt for scene-specific details
manual_config.requires: GOOGLE_API_KEY environment variable set in ComfyUI container
manual_config.garment: Cream sleeveless maxi - thin vertical pinstripes, botanical ink bodice, chain link straps
